messages.title: More funding for Schools and Colleges
messages.content: I have worked closely with local schools opposing the cuts they have faced. As class sizes are rising, there are insufficient teachers to teach them and teaching assistants are losing their jobs. I am committed to ensuring that our education system is funded properly so that our children are not left behind. I want to abolish tuition fees and restore the Educational Maintenance Allowance.

messages.title: More affordable housing
messages.content: As Chair of the Parliamentary Committee for Housing I have campaigned for more affordable housing. I am delighted that Sheffield Council has started to build nearly 3,000 new homes. The first was at Weakland’s in Birley. I also want tougher penalties for bad private sector landlords.

messages.title: Climate Change
messages.content: Recently young people have been demanding action on climate change. I am determined to tackle it. I provided the first funds for Labour’s green new deal including funding more apprenticeships in the green economy. I also want to improve public transport and new tram networks to help tackle climate change, pollution and congestion.

messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content:
Properly fund our NHS and stop Tory and Brexit Party privatisation.
Have more bobbies on the beat to protect our communities.
Keep OAP concessions for travel and fund and free TV licences for over 75s.
Only vote for a Brexit deal that protects workers rights and jobs.
Respect our veterans and ensure we implement the Forces covenant.

messages.title: Personal Statement
messages.content: It has been a real privilege to represent this area in Parliament for over 20 years and I hope you will elect me again so that I can continue to work hard for you.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More funding for Schools and Colleges
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes cuts to local schools, commits to funding education properly, aims to abolish tuition fees and restore Educational Maintenance Allowance.
Campaigns for more affordable housing, supports Sheffield Council's initiative to build nearly 3,000 new homes, advocates for tougher penalties for bad private sector landlords.
Determined to tackle climate change, supports Labour's green new deal, aims to improve public transport and new tram networks to help tackle climate change, pollution and congestion.

Properly fund NHS, stop privatisation, increase police presence, maintain OAP concessions for travel and free TV licenses, protect workers' rights and jobs in Brexit deal, respect veterans and implement Forces covenant.

endorsements.endorser: Angela Fogle, Former Head Handsworth Grange
endorsements.endorsement: When I was headteacher at Handsworth Grange; I saw how hard Clive worked for local schools. At a time when schools have faced such huge cuts, he had to be contacted on a regular basis about funding issues.

As a local GP I know how hard Clive works on behalf of his constituents. He is fighting to keep more funding for the NHS, both to improve hospital care and to enhance local GP care. He’s fought against privatized healthcare too.
